title: Usa deserve to have their little butt spanked
body: You realy deserve it after all the shit your president is doing. No one would be better for that than the almighty Justin Trudeau. He will destroy your president without using any weapons or army. He's gonna steal ya first lady with a smile and make her pay for the motel room with your money. we, Canadians dont kid around with vengeance, we strike where it hurts.
